001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http;
003
004import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.AuthenticationToken;
005import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.AutoCloseableService;
006import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2.TokenSupplier;
007
008/**
009 * Handler for retrieving an oauth authentication token
010 */
011public class OAuthHandler extends AutoCloseableService {
012    private final TokenSupplier supplier;
013    private AuthenticationToken token;
014
015    public OAuthHandler(final TokenSupplier supplier) {
016        this.supplier = supplier;
017    }
018
019    static String authHeader(final AuthenticationToken token) {
020        return "Bearer " + token.getAccessToken();
021    }
022
023    public AuthenticationToken getToken() {
024        if (token == null || token.isExpired())
025            synchronized (this) {
026                if (token == null || token.isExpired())
027                    supplier.getToken().thenApply(authenticationToken -> token = authenticationToken).join();
028            }
029        return token;
030    }
031
032    public AuthenticationToken refreshToken() {
033        token = null;
034        return getToken();
035    }
036
037    @Override
038    protected void internalClose() {
039        if (supplier instanceof AutoCloseable)
040            closeQuietly((AutoCloseable) supplier);
041    }
042}
